prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon that looks sleek and can fly swiftly through the skies.
I want a ghostly creature with a serpentine body and vibrant colors that glows in the dark.
Generate a Pokemon that has a long, flowing tail and can shoot energy blasts from its mouth.
Make a majestic dragon Pokemon with a mix of green and blue shades that lives in the mountains.
Imagine a Pokemon that has the ability to camouflage in its surroundings and appears ethereal.
Design a Pokemon that embodies speed and agility, with sharp features and a streamlined body.
Give me a dragon Pokemon that has a haunting presence and can summon fog around it.

distinctive_features: Two smaller dragon heads on top
